description:
#battlemat #terrain #dnd
Visit my Amazon affiliated links to pick up the Battle Mats:
Battle Mats: https://amzn.to/2HLvYhB
Punch: https://amzn.to/2HvC0PK 
game tokens: https://amzn.to/2I4KleA
D&D minis: https://amzn.to/2r2PUlq

Scottyâ€™s favorite glue gun (affiliated link): http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV

Learn how to incorporate battle mats and terrain for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This tutorial gives you real examples to show how easy it can be to enhance your game table with terrain but still play on a grid. 

To begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: D&D Battle Mats with Terrain to Spice up your Game (DM's Craft #192)
